LocalizedStrings.enGB: A divine strategist can use a standard action to assist another divine spellcaster, granting a +2 circumstance bonus on caster level checks and concentration checks until the beginning of the divine strategist’s next turn. This bonus increases by +1 at 4th level and every four levels thereafter (to a maximum of +7 at 20th level). Caster support can be used to assist arcane spellcasters or characters using magical items, but they gain only half the normal bonus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天策使可以使用一个标准动作帮助另一个神术施法者，使其在下一轮的施法者等级检定和专注检定上获得+2环境加值。这个加值会在4级和之后每提升4级时+1（在20级时达到最大值+7）。此能力可用于支援奥术施法者或角色使用魔法物品，但加值只有如上的一半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The divine strategist leads the armies of the faithful, not from the front lines but through her clever strategy and tactical acumen.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 善用兵者，奇正在人而已。变而神之，所以推乎天也。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A divine strategist gains a bonus on initiative checks equal to 1/2 her cleric level. At 20th level, a divine strategist’s initiative roll is automatically a natural 20. Allies able to see and hear the divine strategist gain a bonus on initiative checks equal to 1/4 the divine strategist’s level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天策使在先攻检定上获得等于她1/2牧师等级的加值。达到20级后，天策使总是在先攻检定中投出自然20。视线内能听到天策使话语的盟友在先攻检定上获得等于她1/4牧师等级的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, a divine strategist’s initiative roll is automatically a natural 20.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到20级后，天策使总是在先攻检定中投出自然20。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 8th level, a divine strategist knows how to take best advantage of tactical opportunities. Once per day as a swift action she may add her Intelligence modifier as a bonus on any single d20 roll. She can use this ability one additional time per day for every two levels after 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到8级后，天策使领悟了如何最优地利用战场机会的能力。每天一次以一个迅捷动作，她可以将她的智力加值加到任意一个d20上。8级后每提升2级，她每天可使用该能力的次数就提升一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 8th level, a divine strategist knows how to take best advantage of tactical opportunities. Whenever she is flanking or makes an attack of opportunity, she may add her Intelligence bonus (if any) as a bonus on the attack roll. In addition, once per day as a swift action she may add her Intelligence modifier as a bonus on any single d20 roll. She can use this ability one additional time per day for every two levels after 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到8级后，天策使领悟了如何最优地利用战场机会的能力。在夹击或借机攻击时，她可以将她的智力加值（如果有）加到攻击检定上。另外，每天一次以一个迅捷动作，她可以将她的智力加值加到任意一个d20上。8级后每提升2级，她每天可使用该能力的次数就提升一次。
